unittitle_ssm: Orville B. Ackerly index of Suffolk County wills and letters of administration
abstract_ssm: One bound volume containing an index of wills and and letters of administration recorded in Suffolk County, Long Island during the period 1787 to 1880.  The index was copied by Orville B. Ackerly from the Suffolk County public records.
subject_ssm: Decedents' estates |z New York (State) |z Suffolk County
